courses.title: Get Started with DAML
courses.description: A short series of tutorials to learn the basics about DAML development.

courses.title: Fundamental DAML Concepts
courses.description: Start modeling your data in DAML, understand the 'signatory', 'observer' and 'controller' keywords and learn how you can write secure and privacy respecting DAML applications.

courses.title: DAML Scripts
courses.description: Test your DAML models with scripts and interact with any DAML ledger from the command line.

courses.title: Upgrading DAML Applications
courses.description: Learn how to upgrade running DAML aplication and migrate existing data to your new model.

courses.title: Automation with DAML Triggers
courses.description: Use DAML triggers to automatically execute choices when a specified ledger event occurs.

courses.title: Deploying DAML on Production Ledgers
courses.description: Get familiar with running a DAML application on distributed ledgers.

courses.title: Web SDK
courses.description: A plain environment to use the DAML SDK in.

scenarios.title: DAML Scripts
scenarios.description: Test your DAML models with scripts and interact with live ledgers from the command line.
